actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A Bill to provide for research programs to develop new agricultural commodities, to develop new non-food uses for agricultural commodities, to develop new industrial or commercial uses for the byproducts of agricultural commodities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out research and education programs with regard to the development of: (1) new agricultural commodities with commercial potential; (2) commercially sound nonfood uses for agricultural commodities; and (3) commercially sound uses for the byproducts of agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A Bill to provide for research programs to develop new agricultural commodities, to develop new non-food uses for agricultural commodities, to develop new industrial or commercial uses for the byproducts of agricultural commodities, and for other purposes.
